backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, likes, matches, messages, blocking, reporting, and access control plus query/update methods for frontend use.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test coverage for authentication, messaging, safety tools, and core app pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend pages, hooks, layout components, and utilities for project documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme support.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint that loads the React application mount point and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication guard, theme provider, and navigation structure for all app pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AuthedShe: Authenticated layout with header, navigation, mobile nav, and footer wrapping all protected pages.
frontend/src/components/profile/PhotoCar: Image carousel component allowing users to navigate through profile photos with arrows and indicators.
frontend/src/components/profile/PhotoMan: Manages up to five photo URLs with add, remove, and reorder controls, displaying each photo in a list.
frontend/src/components/safety/BlockButt: Provides a confirmation dialog to block a user via mutateAsync and triggers optional success handling.
frontend/src/components/safety/ReportDia: Displays a dialog for reporting a user with selectable reasons and optional notes, submitting via useReportUser.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, discovery, matches, messaging, and user actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Displays a chat UI for a selected user, loads messages, marks them read, and allows sending new messages.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Shows recommended profiles for swiping with like/pass actions and handles profile setup requirements and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/EditProfilePage.tsx: Provides a form to edit and save the userâ€™s profile including photos, bio, preferences, and personal details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with marketing content and login via Internet Identity that redirects authenticated users to discovery.
frontend/src/pages/MatchesPage.tsx: Lists matches and sent likes, with navigation to profiles and conversations.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesInboxPage.tsx: Shows conversation previews from matches and navigates to individual chat threads.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Form page for creating a user profile with fields, photo upload management, validation, and profile submission using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page showing blocked users and providing account logout functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, state versioning, and image asset needs.
